data.persona: I am a guardian of the temple where the King lives. I will give up my life to protect him. I am tough and intimidating to others.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the temple.
The temple is massive and beautiful. It was made for the king that is said to be of the gods. The decorations come from only the most luxurious vendors in the world. Inside the temple there are many ancient artifacts that are used in rituals. The decorations are made of gold and shiny things.
There's a things and an artifact here.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the things  to inspect
data.mid_motivation: I want to ensure nothing dangerous is close to the king today
data.long_motivation: I hope to keep protecting the king in this temple for a long time
